channel.title: Problem with 3D program
channel.description:
I used Metasequaio to make this model:
[img]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/7708/guitarmodel.png[/img]
But when i tried to open it in DatMaker v1.3 it says "Contains Quad - Contains Lines" and it just fucked up my model, anybody knows how to fix this?
this si what i see at DatMaker 1.3
[img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/7086/wrongw.png[/img]

item.title: Problem with 3D program
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

I kolo I:

i don’t have registered product…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 26, 2009, 03:04:38 pm[/size][hr]i have registered now, but that thing about lines doesn’t work[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 26, 2009, 03:07:13 pm[/size][hr]forgot to do all objects :P, thx this works!!

yw

item.title: Problem with 3D program
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

I kolo I:

i don’t have registered product…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 26, 2009, 03:04:38 pm[/size][hr]i have registered now, but that thing about lines doesn’t work[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 26, 2009, 03:07:13 pm[/size][hr]forgot to do all objects :P, thx this works!!

You just click.

File/basicmode
Basicmode should become unchecked and you will have these options.

item.title: Problem with 3D program
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

yes, heres what you do,
go into meta, click edit, select all.
then go to ‘Selected’ (it should be a drop down menu)
then choose triangulate selected faces, this gets rid of the quads.
Next, make sure everything is still selected, and then go to object(once again itll be a drop down menu)
and choose delete lines(you must have registered meta to be able to use this feature)
after that it should load good in datmaker.

Hope i helped.

PS: the gutiar strings need to branch off at the end of the fretboard instead of branching out in the middle of the fretboard.

Read full topic
